name: CyberCrashCoin
description: CyberCrash is a next-gen cyberpunk on-chain PvP and PvE strategy game incubated and published by MetaCene Universe, set in 2177. Players command squads of unique cybernetic heroes, called Inspectors, in tactical turn-based battles across a world where AI controls both digital and physical realms. Collect, upgrade, and trade NFTs, join DAO governance, and earn rewards in a true play-to-earn ecosystem. With stunning AAA 3D visuals and a parallel web-based world for casual exploration, CyberCrash delivers an immersive, multi-dimensional Web3 experience that fuses strategy, storytelling, and player-driven innovation.
